item.description: Jack, Bella and I really liked this place. Its great for us city dwellers to get the opportunity to enjoy so much open space and fresh air. So we'll be at the park on most Wednesdays. I hate to get into a rut but this place is convenient and not too far to travel for us. I think it'll be a great mid week treat for us and the rest of the pack. So look for this Meetup to happen almost weekly. As always its a joy getting to meet everyone. If you don't see us waiting in the parking lot, then were up in the fields playing fetch. As always bring poop bags, toys ( if you want) and water ( for yourself and you dog) WOOF WOOF.
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a Chevy Tracker with a "WOOF" sticker on back

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: A Romp in the Park
